attributes.additional_details:
A political party that is for the people and run by the people.
The government should go back in history and recollect what the political arena was for. It was to give the people a voice and to work for and on behalf of the people. In current times the political party is not for anyone but the politicians, who are crushing the people with their austerity, but the politicians are looking at wage rises and good expenses even in the wake of the expenses scandal.
Where is the justice for the people? Get back to basics!
